tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Exceptional Pediatrician - Highly Recommend!

I cannot express enough gratitude for the exceptional care provided by Dr. Nandita. From the moment we took decision to come over to Cloud9 from London to deliver our baby and the moment we walked into her chamber, we felt welcomed and valued as a family. Dr. Nandita goes above and beyond to ensure the well-being of the child. 

Dr. Nandita possesses a rare combination of expertise, compassion, and patience. Her extensive knowledge in pediatrics is evident in every interaction, as they take the time to thoroughly explain medical concepts and treatment options in a way that is easily understandable. They truly empower parents to make informed decisions regarding their child's health.

What sets Dr. Nandita apart is their unwavering support and genuine care for their patients. They make themselves readily available offline as well, always taking the time to listen attentively to our concerns and address them with empathy and understanding. Whether it's a routine check-up or a more urgent matter, we have complete confidence in Dr. Nandita’s ability to provide expert guidance and support.

Furthermore, the entire staff at Nandita's practice (including our Gynac doc Pooja Mam ) exudes professionalism and warmth, creating a welcoming environment for families. From the friendly receptionists to the dedicated nurses, everyone works seamlessly together to ensure a positive experience for patients and their families.

In summary, I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Nandita to any parent seeking top-notch pediatric care. Their dedication to their patients' well-being, combined with their compassionate approach, makes them a true asset to the medical community. Our family feels incredibly fortunate to have Dr. Nandita as our pediatrician, and we are grateful for the positive impact they have had on our child's health and development.

Thank you, Dr. Nandita, for your outstanding care and support. We would like to seek your assistance when we will be in abroad as well. 

Warm regards,
Padmaja & Kishore

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dear Dr. Nandita,

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to express my deepest gratitude for the exceptional care and support you have provided to my child over the past several years.

From the moment we first encountered you, it was evident that you are not just a pediatrician, but a true angel in disguise. Your patience, kindness, and unwavering dedication to your young patients are qualities that set you apart.

I still remember the first time we sought your assistance when my child's finger accidentally got caught in a door. Instead of rushing into the examination, you took the time to calm my child down, listened to her story, and made her feel comfortable before proceeding. Your child-friendly approach to examination truly made a difference and eased our worries.

What truly amazed us was your willingness to go above and beyond for your patients. Your availability on WhatsApp, even outside of office hours, speaks volumes about your commitment to their well-being. I cannot express enough gratitude for the prompt assistance you provided during our recent outstation trip when our child fell ill. Your willingness to connect via video call, examine her, and prescribe the necessary medication promptly alleviated our concerns and ensured her speedy recovery.

Thanks to your expertise and compassionate care, our daughter was back to her playful self by the next day of our vacation. Your dedication to your profession and your patients is truly commendable, and I believe every pediatrician could learn a great deal from you.

In conclusion, Dr. Nandita, you are not just a doctor but a shining example of humanity and compassion. Thank you for everything you do, and may you continue to inspire and heal many more young hearts.

With heartfelt appreciation,
Miraya's parents

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Hi... My son who was 3 yrs old got severe stomach infection and consulted Dr Nandita in cloudnine for emergency. Dr Nandita gave immediate attention and calmly explained the health issues and the treatment plan. My son had to be admitted for antibiotics and treatment for his symptoms. Dr. Had taken care of him very well and gave right medications. He was able to recover in 24 hrs. We were fully satisfied with the treatment and recommended the doctor for any pediatric care. 

Dr. Also approachable through WhatsApp and would clarify with details if we post any queries regarding treatment and medications.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Nandita Patwari is our go-to pediatrician for our twin boy's healthcare needs since their birth in 2020. Her exceptional qualities as a pediatrician have made her our first choice since we began consulting her. 
Her friendly and approachable demeanor has been instrumental in creating a strong bond not just with us, but also with our boys, who genuinely likes her. This trust and comfort are essential when it comes to the well-being of children. One of her standout attributes is her responsiveness. She doesn't confine her care to office hours; she's always willing to answer our questions and address our concerns at any point in time. This accessibility and dedication have been a tremendous source of support for us. Her expertise in pediatric care is complemented by her empathetic nature, a quality that is invaluable for first-time parents. Dr. Nandita has an exceptional ability to connect with children, making them feel at ease during their medical appointments. During our interactions, she consistently conducts thorough examinations and explains medical conditions and treatment plans in a clear and understandable manner. She's an advocate for responsible medical care and avoids prescribing unnecessary medications, which is reassuring for parents who want the best for their children. What also sets her apart is her proactive approach. Many times, she has gone beyond her regular practice hours to accommodate our urgent needs. Her availability and quick responses to our inquiries via WhatsApp or phone calls have been a lifeline during moments of uncertainty. We have had a wonderful experience with her, and we wholeheartedly recommend her to all parents.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Nandita is extremely helpful and friendly she made my 3.5 yr old daughter trust her so much so that she would want to take medicines as prescribed by her. 
She went over and beyond to help me with my daughter’s prolonged treatment. Puts you at ease after meeting her with the understanding and patience she has on the matter. Extremely nice and friendly with the kids to be able to respond and talk to her. I highly recommend Dr. Nandita she is a saviour.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Our experience is too good with dr Nandita patwari. She always explained the whole things and she listened very carefully all my questions and explained the whole thing in details . We had interacted more than 5 times after delivery and she helped a lot.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Nandita's approach to pediatric care is special. She takes special care to make the kids comfortable. Her warm demeanor instantly puts children at ease, creating an environment where they feel comfortable in expressing their concerns. 

She is cautious in her approach to medication. She takes the time to thoroughly assess the situation and doesn't prescribe an overdose of antibiotics and other medicines. This helps in addressing various anxieties that many parents may have about overmedicating their children. 

Dr. Nandita's support has been invaluable to our family. She has also responded to us during certain situations where she has also replied to us on WhatsApp and has also checked in for the status of the recovery of our daughter. She has recently moved to a new centre of Cloudnine but we are sure that we will move to the new centre only for Dr Nandita.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Your expertise and thoroughness in addressing our concerns and explaining medical details have been invaluable. We truly appreciate the time you take to listen and the genuine care you extend to our child.The friendly and nurturing environment of your practice has made each visit a positive experience for our family. Your ability to create a comfortable space for both children and parents speaks volumes about your commitment to holistic care.Thank you for being not just a skilled pediatrician but also a compassionate and understanding healthcare provider. We are grateful to have you as our child's doctor and look forward to continued visits under your expert guidance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Patwari is a fantastic pediatrician who has been looking after my son’s health for the past two years. She is very kind, attentive, and knowledgeable. 

She always friendly with us and with my son and makes my son feel at ease. She is always available for consultation and follow-up. She has a thorough approach and a keen eye for detail. She diagnoses the problems accurately and prescribes the best treatments for my son (with only necessary medication). 

I trust her completely and I highly recommend her to anyone looking for a reliable and friendly pediatrician for their kids.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr. Nandita Patwari has been a great doctor. I got her as recommendation from my OB-GYN who delivered my baby. She is very friendly and patient. Our conversations don’t stop with just our baby. She always takes the time to answer all my questions and concerns.

She responds to my queries at any time through WhatsApp. Sometimes in the middle of the night. She refrains from unnecessary medications and tries to stick to minimal medical interventions. She is gentle and patient during examinations and she always makes my baby feel comfortable.  

She has a very chill vibe about her and that calms me down too from overthinking about my babies health and development. I love her quote “don’t worry so much, it’s normal” 😅.

I recommend her 110%.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Our baby was born extremely premature and had to stay in NICU for approx three months. We met Dr. Nandita @NICU. Those three months were extremely draining for us specially mentally.  But due to the presence of Dr.Nandita we were a bit relieved and relaxed as with each passing day we were gaining our confidence back . The way she made us understand the situation and the treatment plan was extremely helpful and calming. We were quite sure that our baby is in extremely good doctors care. Thanku so much Dr Nandita for all your care and support during our most critical three months of life journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We have been consulting Dr. Nandita for our daughter for quite a while.

She combines expertise and a willingness to listen. All our silly questions have always been answered with sincerity. She is extremely good with children. She has good grasp on several languages, which sometimes help her to connect with kids.

Each time we have met, she has provided thorough examinations and explained everything to us in a very clear manner. No unnecessary medications have even been prescribed by her as she is adept at her diagnosis.

Many a times, she did consultation outside her OPD timings for us based on the urgency of the situation. She actively responds to all our whatsapp messages and suggests treatments/ medicines.

We had a wonderful experience with her, and I would strongly recommend her to all worrisome parents.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: We have been consulting Dr.Nandita Patwari from Mar 2022. Consulted for high fever for my daughter and within one dose of medicine the fever completely came down. Dr.Nandita is very quick in analysing the symptoms n prescribing right medicine.  She doesn't load the kids with too much of medicine. She has a technique of interacting with kids. Very caring and friendly nature is definitely must to mention. At times she goes beyond her way to support us. My daughter loves her a lot n always ready to listen to her instructions. Thank you so much Dr for all your support for all the way from Mar 22 till date. Once you consult Dr.Nandita, I am sure she will become your family Dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I relocated to Bangalore with family.  I was looking out for a pediatrician for my 1.5 year old kid. I am lucky to meet Dr. Nandita. She was very understanding. The way she explains and connects with parents like is amazing. She would ensure that the parents understands the reasons and treatment well. As a working parent, it's not always possible to visit hospital. She ensures that she responds to all messages and calls. She empathesizes with the parents and comforts them when they are most stressed. She honest and transparent with all the treatment recommendations for any issues. 

I would strongly recommend her to all parents. She is the best person I have met who is so loving and caring.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: What differentiates Dr Patwari from the other paediatricians in our experience is her ability to quickly diagnose the issue and to treat the issue on its own merit. She is extremely confident, affectionate towards children and has a very calming influence on the parents. My daughter more recently has had a few bouts of cough cold running nose issues including a more recent chapter where we had to take her to the hospital as an emergency measure. Even though it was quite late in the night we were very happy with her responsiveness and guidance. We would highly recommend her as a paediatrician.

tags: None
review:
*** ** *** ** *** **** ************* ** *********, My daughter was having very high fever, loose motion and very frequent vomit. We consultation with other doctors but no improvement after even after three days, then we consulted Dr. Nandita Patwari ma’am. After first consultation fever was in control and after one day when loose motion was in not in control, I Whatsaap her about that and she suggested other medicine. She is now completely recovered. The best part is you can contact here even in late night and you will get reply and suggestions. Anyone looking for paediatrician for their child, I would recommend you should visit her once. 
Happy with over all experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Nandhitha patwari is kids friendly and she attends all of our health queries patiently. Even over WhatsApp also she is available and respond to our chats. Very satisfied with this doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We have been consulting Dr. Nandita from the time when my child was suffering from severe bronchitis. We visited other hospitals and even consulted same hospital’s experienced doctor but there was no improvement.
That is when we consulted her and i must say she handled this case so well and with so much care that he was fit and fine within two to three days under her supervision.
Since then we dedicatedly consult only her for our baby’s all pedriatic related issues. Growth and development, vaccinations, etc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: * **** **** ******* She is very simple and gentle in her behavior. Very friendly with the child. She will give sufficient time to explain our concerns. She studies the patient and disease meticulously. We can freely interact with the doctor.  We always show our child to Dr.Nandita Patwari for any health issues and vaccinations.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Nandita was my child’s  paediatrician from day1.
She has been very supportive and explains the issues/to do things quite well. She is empathetic,  which I think is the most we need as first time moms. She is just a text away in case of any queries. Very much satisfied and would recommend her to all the first time mommies out there.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
When it comes to our child health, Dr Nandita is our go to doctor. We visited her when our kid got sick very often. Her friendly nature and right treatment helped us create the bond. My kid likes her too.
She always responds and answers to our queries at any point of time and it helped a lot with our child’s health.
Will definitely recommend her for her expertise and nature.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We had consulted Dr Nandita Patwari couple of times now for our Kidoo’s general health care and can say she has developed a connect with him which is the key for treating kids. She actively listens to our concerns and examines throughly prior to suggesting medication. Also she ensures to provide reasonable information about being proactive in ensuring kids are healthy. Thus far we are happy consulting her and would recommend her for any Pediatrician requirements.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My Son was suffering from whizzing for a day. Then we met Dr Nandita Patwari, she explained the issue and gave a proper medication. After first doze of nebulization itself my son started feeling better.

I recommend this Dr, since she is very friendly with the kids and identify the issue instantly and provide right medication.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is vey friendly and just a message away when you need. Our son is 3 yrs old and from the beginning we are consulting with her..Highly recommended..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Nandita diagnosed the dengue symptoms on time and suggested the right course of treatment for my daughter and helped her in recovery.  She was polite and friendly and answered all of our queries patiently. She is very knowledgeable, child friendly and supportive. She was great with handling my teenager and addressed all her concerns. I would highly recommend Dr.Nandita, she is fantastic!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

I moved to Bangalore with my family and I was looking for pediatric doctor in Bellandur for my 18month kid. After few unsatisfactory consultation in other clinics, I visited Dr. Nandita , since then I trust her for my kid and its more than a year now.
*** ******* ****** ********* *********** ********* *** **** * Most important is she is always available .

tags: None
review:
We had a really good experience with Dr Nandita for our 4 yr old son.
We went to her when our kid had fever and rashes all over his body.She explained us the scenario, why it has happened and what meds are being prescribed.
She made it a point to be available for all our queries along the course of this treatment.
Thank you doctor for all the help.
Highly recommended.

tags: None
review: Dr. Nandita is the only doctor I trust for my baby. I started consulting her for my baby last year when we moved to Bangalore and since then I have been consulting her. She doesn’t give unnecessary medicine and tests and always answers to questions of an anxious mother in a most simple way.

tags: None
review: Dr. Nandita Patwari mam is a great doctor! We consulted her when our baby has loose motions, she treated really well and explained everything to us in a very clear manner. She is very friendly and helpful. I really appreciate that whenever we have concerns  she used to suggest medicines accordingly over message. We are so glad that we found her and would highly recommend her to anyone looking for a pediatrician.

tags: None
review: she is our go to doctor,we consulted her when our baby is 5 months old now my baby is 19 months , so still we are consulting that doctor only .she is very good and listens very carefully our problems .the best thing i like from her is she will give her contact she will quickly respond when we message her at any time , and suggest good medicines .love towards her .if u are looking any pediatrician who will be in touch with u plz go ahead with her appoitment.thanks.

tags: None
review: We have a really nice experience with doctor.  We went couple of times to doctor for our son’s consultation. She gives a detailed explanation of each query, able to calm son, and examine. She gave enough time to answer any development related questions. I highly recommend her.

tags: None
review: We've been going to Dr. Nandita since my baby was 6 months old. She's 2 now and I was so happy to have found her. She's got most of her vaccinations from her. There were times when my baby was sick and Dr. was not available to examine her in person and all those times she's kept in touch over phone. She always checks back too. We absolutely love going to her and would 200% recommend her to anyone. 🙂

tags: None
review: We have been consulting Dr. Nandita Patwari for over a year now and extremely satisfied with the experience. She is a confident doctor, prescribes optimal dosage of required medicines and is approachable for emergency consultations as well. Highly recommended!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We consulted Dr. Nandita when our Kid was suffering from high fever for 1-2 days. She was very friendly and heard our complaints patiently. She was kind enough to review blood reports via WhatsApp and suggested further course of action. Really happy with the overall experience.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Highly recommend.

review: Dr Nandita listened well and understood the child's symptoms. She was available at an odd hour to guide us as the child had a high fever and had puked his medication. The child has recovered now as per the timeline mentioned by Dr. Nandita. Thank you Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We visited Dr.Nandita for our new born baby post delivery. She is very calm and answers all questions patiently. Having a new born, we had many questions and concerns. Understanding this, she also gave us a number on which we can text and ask our questions and she responds promptly easing our concerns.
